data.name: VeeR VR
data.detailed_description:
VeeR is a VR content app, providing tens of thousands authentic and immersive 360 videos, vr photos and interactive experience. On VeeR, you can not only watching the videos and photos but also get the interactive experience from VR content. Such an experience is not paralleled by any other VR platform.

Key Features of VeeR VR 2.0:

EXPLORE THE BEST ORIGINAL VR CONTENT
VeeR intelligently recommend original VR video and photos based on your interest. From VR roller coaster to VR skydiving, from VR horror to VR movies. VeeR is all you need to experience the world in VR.

INTERACT WITH TOP VR CONTENT CREATORS
VeeR puts you in front of a global community of top VR creators. From European VR journalist to Hollywood VR studio. You can comment, like and share their work and interact with them face-to-face.

EXPERIENCE SMOOTH ULTRA HD
VeeR brings in the best VR streaming technologies, featuring low-latency and ultra-HD resolution.

SHARE YOUR VR CONTENT WITH THE WORLD
VeeR enables you to quickly share your VR content with the world, and provide VR content analytics tool to help you improve your VR experience.

VeeR VR 2.0 Quick Start Guide:
Customized sections on VeeRland: Follow, Featured, For you;
Profile page: Check out the uploaded/ downloaded VR content, enjoy and manage your favorite VR video and VR images;
Streaming page: Discover more related VR content, download and watch offline, creator information;
More features supported, such as built-in search, user login, like and favorite, offline viewing function.

Enjoy your time in the VeeR Land.

data.short_description: VeeR VR: Global VR video community for virtual reality video lovers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100/AMD FX4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 9800/NVIDIA GTX 1050Ti/NVIDIA GTX 960 or AMD 4870/AMD RADEON RX 480/AMD RADEON R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
